server-component.title: Voice Mix - Play with Your Voice
server-component.description: This is a site where you can experiment with your voice. It supports reverse playback, fast playback, and slow playback. No installation is required, and it's free.
server-component.sharetext: A site where you can play with your voice. Give it a try! #VoiceMix
server-component.keywords: voice, voice mix, reverse playback, voice synthesis, pitch change, Japanese, recording, synthesis
server-component.ogTitle: Voice Mix - Play with Your Voice
server-component.ogDescription: A site where you can enjoy reversing and changing the pitch of your voice.
